arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

-- Sets an escape location for the NPC to run to based on where the player comes from.
	idEscapeLoc = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(S_ACTOR_MARKER_LOCATION, idActor, false, 0,0)
end

function Start(idActorKiller, szGroup)

-- Increment the wave count.	
	nWaveCount = nWaveCount + 1	
	Hydra.EventSend("WaveClear", idSelf)
		
-- Add a small pause between waves.	
	Hydra.Wait(1)
			
-- Wave spawning	
	if nWaveCount == 1 then --wave 1 just died, spawn wave 2
		
		for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tWAVE_02) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then 
				Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
			end
		end
		
	elseif nWaveCount == 2 then -- wave 2 just died, spawn wave 3
		--NPC callout
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLastStandNPC) then 
			Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_CALLOUT, idLastStandNPC)
		end
		
		for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tWAVE_03) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then 
				Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
				Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(idSpawner)
			end
		end
		
	elseif nWaveCount > 2 then -- Wave 4 +
			
		for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tWAVE_03) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then 
				Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
				Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(idSpawner)
			end
		end	
		
	end
end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
-- This spawns the initial wave
for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tWAVE_01) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
	end
end

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

--Spawn reward chest
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idChest) then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idChest, false)	
	end

-- The NPC rewards the player and then runs off.	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorNPC) then
		Hydra.TreasureClassDropAtActor(idActorNPC, S_TREASURECLASS_NORMAL, true)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idLastStandNPC, idEscapeLoc, "NPC_RUN", true)
		Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idLastStandNPC, 1)
	end

end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
-- Call anims to have the NPC stand up.
if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLastStandNPC) then
	Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idLastStandNPC, S_ANIMPOWER_GETUP, S_ANIMPOWER_NEUTRAL_ALT)
end

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	
--Spawn reward chest
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idChest) then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idChest, false)	
	end
	
-- The NPC dies.
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorNPC) then
		Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idLastStandNPC, S_ANIMPOWER_DEATH, S_ANIMPOWER_DEAD)
	end
		
end

arCallbackSets.unk_98d4504:
--Player successfully completed the waves, set the appropriate variable.
	nVictoryTier = 1

-- Sets the DRLG designer variable so the chest encounter spawns the correct one.
	Hydra.SetGameVariableNumeric("DE_ChestRewardRare", 1)

--If the player completed the mastery advance this phase.
if nVictoryTier == 1 then
	Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()
end

--If the player failed the mastery advance this phase.
if nVictoryTier == 0 then
	Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()
end

unk_39af3bb:
if nVictoryTier == 0 and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idRewardChest) then
	--Hydra.ActorEnable(idRewardChest);
end
if nVictoryTier == 1 and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idRewardChest_Large) then
	--Hydra.ActorEnable(idRewardChest_Large);
end

Hydra.EventSend("DungeonEventComplete")
